# Attributed String Key

**API Collection**

This constant is used as a key for person name component attributes in attributed strings returned by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/PersonNameComponentsFormatter/annotatedString(from:)] method

## Constants

- **NSPersonNameComponentKey**

## Constants

- **PersonNameComponentsFormatter.Style**
- **PersonNameComponentsFormatter.Options**
- **Attributed String Components**: These constants are used to identify individual components of attributed strings returned by the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/PersonNameComponentsFormatter/annotatedString(from:)] method.
- **Component Delimiter**: This constant defines the delimiter used to separate name components.
